RoomDescription: The air in the bakery is more delicious than any flavour contained within bread, somehow the aroma captures everything good about the baking breads contained within the ovens.  There is a row of ovens that seem to be perpetually stoked by a number of young boys to keep them hot enough to bake.  The ovens seem to be frequented by a number of people from the skullery maids of large houses through to the poor from the city... the free warmth draws in everyone.
